name: International Conference on Computational Intelligence and Data Science
content: IC-CIDS 2018 provides a platform for researchers, scientists and academia with Computational Intelligence and Data Science background to meet and exchange research ideas, collaborate and work together to make the knowledge sharing forum an innovative one. It also proposes to focus on all aspects of computation, Intelligence and data sciences with modern and emerging computational techniques with key areas which require very high precision.We also give opportunity to young researchers to present their research work in this platform.
topics: computer graphics, animation, virtual reality & gaming
organizers: Sankara College of Science and Commerce
